synopsis.text: The anime unfolds in the 23rd century, where a clandestine organization known as Shadow threatens global domination. To counteract this menace, billionaire Midoriyama Rei establishes a covert unit named Circus, featuring the formidable mecha Galvion. When faced with a shortage of skilled pilots, Rei strikes a deal with two convicts, Mu and Maya, offering them a chance to reduce their lengthy prison sentences by piloting the Galvion to protect the innocent and challenge the nefarious Shadow.
